name: Rainbow Ride (Karlamichigod)
description: Rainbow Ride is a PC-based Game that mixes a 3D Vehicle Combat gameplay and 2D animated cut-scenes. The story happens in Cherry town where our protagonist, a father unicorn, must start a bloody career against time across an enchanted forest to save his only daughter. By gathering items and shooting cute yet twisted monsters, he will achieve glory and his daughter’s health. Rainbow Ride is a crazy mix between games such as Mario Kart, Crash Bandicoot and Doom Eternal with a cute and psychedelic twist.
